title: Racist Riot
body: I have been trying to submit a ticket as to my chat restriction, and your game refuses to acknowledge me even logging in to the support page, let alone discussing my restriction. Every time it lets me log in, it refuses me the ability to post a ticket regarding your biased chat restriction. Let me know if you intend to fix this or not.

replies.body:
Not sure how a bug makes Riot racist, but this should help you out: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/IiU4rJdY-issue-submitting-support-ticket

>While this is being investigated by our engineer, you can work around this by logging out of the League of Legends website and logging into the Support Site before submitting your support ticket.

>If you still have issues submitting a support ticket, please feel free to reply to this thread or reach out through the Riot Games Support Twitter so we can assist you with accessing the Support Site.

You can also try logging into the support site in an incognito/private window which will both have you logged out of boards and will stop any addons that may be interfering.

Also not a Community Event, Help and Support or Player Behaviour would have been a better place to post.
And how does this make riot racist exactly?

Holy shit! Riot developed a system that identifies your race based on trying to login?

That's some next level shit bro.
